Typedef Documentation

typedef elasticPlan_t* elasticPlan
 

General plan for elastic solver. Holds workspace and variables for 2 and 3 dimensional transforms.

Author:
Stefan Wirtz
Date:
26/07/2005

Creates and initializes the elasticMatrix for 2D transforms.

Author:
Stefan Wirtz and Konstantin Ens
Date:
12/12/2005
Parameters:
m1 number of Voxels in x1-Dimension
m2 number of Voxels in x2-Dimension
alpha smoothness factor alpha
mu First Lame constant
lambda Second Lame constant
h1 Voxelsize in x1-Dimension

double ***  in,
double ***  out
) 
 

Solve LS of Elastic Registration 2D where 'in' is the rhs of the system and 'out' means u^{k+1}.

Parameters:
EP elastic Plan
in right hand side of the system
out output
